TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Sheets implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 指定的或活动工作簿中所有工作表的集合。

span.span: A collection of all the sheets in the specified or active workbook.

span.para: Sheets集合可以包含或对象。您想要返回的任何类型的工作表时， Sheets集合很有用。如果您需要使用工作表的一种类型，请参阅该工作表类型的对象主题。
使用属性返回的Sheets集合。
使用方法可创建新工作表并将其添加到集合。
使用工作表()，其中是工作表名称或索引号，返回单个或对象。
使用工作表() 来指定多个工作表。

The Sheets collection can contain or objects. The Sheets collection is useful when you want to return sheets of any type. If you need to work with sheets of only one type, see the object topic for that sheet type.
Use the property to return the Sheets collection.
Use the method to create a new sheet and add it to the collection.
Use Sheets(), where is the sheet name or index number, to return a single or object.
Use Sheets() to specify more than one sheet.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Add (object Before, object After, object Count, object Type);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Add([in]object Before, [in]object After, [in]object Count, [in]object Type) runtime managed
Public Function Add (Optional Before As Object, Optional After As Object, Optional Count As Object, Optional Type As Object) As Object

param.name: Before

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定工作表的对象，新建的工作表将置于此工作表之前。

span.span: An object that specifies the sheet before which the new sheet is added.

param.name: After

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定工作表的对象，新建的工作表将置于此工作表之后。

span.span: An object that specifies the sheet after which the new sheet is added.
Optional Object.
The number of sheets to be added.
The default value is one.

param.name: Type

span.span: Optional Object.
Specifies the sheet type.

param.span: 可以是以下项之一常量：滴、 xlChart、 xlExcel4MacroSheet或xlExcel4IntlMacroSheet。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: xlWorksheet, xlChart, xlExcel4MacroSheet, or xlExcel4IntlMacroSheet.

param.span: 如果您要插入工作表基于现有模板，指定模板的路径。

span.span: If you are inserting a sheet based on an existing template, specify the path to the template.
The default value is xlWorksheet.

summary.span: 新建工作表、图表或宏表。新建的工作表将成为活动工作表。

span.span: Creates a new worksheet, chart, or macro sheet. The new worksheet becomes the active sheet.

span.para: 如果和是同时省略，新建的工作表插入到活动工作表之前。
If and are both omitted, the new sheet is inserted before the active sheet.

summary.span: 此方法仅实现的Charts集合对象，并将产生一个运行的时错误，如果在工作表和工作表对象上使用。

span.span: This method is only implemented for the Charts collection object and will produce a run time error if used on the Sheets and Worksheets objects.

summary.span: 将工作表复制到工作簿的另一位置。

span.span: Copies the sheet to another location in the workbook.

span.para: 如果不指定或，Microsoft Excel 将新建一个包含复制的工作表的新工作簿。
If you don't specify either or , Microsoft Excel creates a new workbook that contains the copied sheet.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator { get; }
.property instance valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As XlCreator
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator Creator { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

summary.span: 如果在 Microsoft Excel 中创建对象，此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454c。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only .

span.para: Creator属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Excel 的创建者代码 XCEL。
The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void FillAcrossSheets([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range Range, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlFillWith Type) runtime managed

param.name: Range

span.span: Required Range object.

param.span: 要填充集合中的所有工作表上的范围。

span.span: The range to fill on all the worksheets in the collection.

param.span: 该范围必须从集合中的工作表。

span.span: The range must be from a worksheet within the collection.
Optional .
Specifies how to copy the range.

summary.span: 将单元格区域复制到集合中所有其他工作表的同一位置。

span.span: Copies a range to the same area on all other worksheets in a collection.

span.para: 没有限制为每个工作表的 1,026 水平分页符。

MemberSignature.Value: public void PrintOut (object From, object To, object Copies, object Preview, object ActivePrinter, object PrintToFile, object Collate, object PrToFileName);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PrintOut([in]object From, [in]object To, [in]object Copies, [in]object Preview, [in]object ActivePrinter, [in]object PrintToFile, [in]object Collate, [in]object PrToFileName) runtime managed

Public Sub PrintOut (Optional From As Object, Optional To As Object, Optional Copies As Object, Optional Preview As Object, Optional ActivePrinter As Object, Optional PrintToFile As Object, Optional Collate As Object, Optional PrToFileName As Object)

param.name: From

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 从中开始打印的页的页码。

span.span: The number of the page at which to start printing.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则打印从开头。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, printing starts at the beginning.

param.name: To

span.span: Optional Object.
The number of the last page to print.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则打印至最后一页。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, printing ends with the last page.

param.name: Copies

span.span: Optional Object.
The number of copies to print.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则打印一份。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, one copy is printed.

param.name: Preview

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: True由 Microsoft Excel 调用之前打印对象的打印预览。

span.span: True to have Microsoft Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.

param.span: False（或省略） 若要立即打印对象。

span.span: False (or omitted) to print the object immediately.

param.name: ActivePrinter

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 设置活动打印机的名称。

span.span: Sets the name of the active printer.

param.name: PrintToFile

span.span: Optional Object.
True to print to a file.

param.span: 如果未指定，则 Microsoft Excel 将提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

span.span: If is not specified, Microsoft Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.

param.name: Collate

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则逐份打印多个副本。

span.span: True to collate multiple copies.

param.name: PrToFileName

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果设置为True，则该参数指定要打印到的文件的名称。

span.span: If is set to True, this argument specifies the name of the file you want to print to.

summary.span: 打印对象。

span.span: Prints the object.

span.para: "页面"的说明中的和指打印页 — 表或工作簿中的未全部页。
"Pages" in the descriptions of and refers to printed pages — not overall pages in the sheet or workbook.
